reviewText: The fifth episode of this third season, PUBLISH OR PERISH, was broadcasted on Jan. 18th, 1974. It's also possible to watch this episode in the DVD standard by purchasing Columbo - The Complete Third Season. After Columbo Collector's Edition: Double Shock, this is the second and last Columbo episode directed by Robert Butler. Note also that the victim Alan Mallory is played by the well-known writer Mickey The Mike Hammer Collection Volume 1 Spillane. In this episode, Lt. Columbo must confound the publisher Riley Greenleaf who hired a hitman to kill Allan Mallory, his most profit-making writer who was about to sign with a competitor. The screenplay is really top-notch and the use of the split screen technique by Robert Butler well thought. This episode is undoubtedly one of the best of the third season. A VHS to keep in your library.
